name: Molotov Your Town Hall
description:
Pizza Jam 2018 Theme: Movement

They have taken everything away from you. Now, you take it back. Find and burn down government buildings with your molotovs. Rally support from the populace and start an uprising. The National Director must fall.

Team - 

  • Reg Chou - Art
  • James Lee - Programming & Art
  • Claire Lovell - Music
  • Robert Lytle - Programming & Design

Soundtrack -

https://mecham.bandcamp.com/album/molotov-your-town-hall-ost
